dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.agreement.AgreementTermOrCondition
dataStructure.description:
Aspects of the Agreement not formally specified elsewhere in the Agreement and that cannot be captured elsewhere in a formal notation, or automatically monitored and require a more human level of management.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: AgreementTermOrCondition

child.name: term_conditionNumber
child.description:
Unique number assigned for reference.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: term_conditionNumber

child.name: description
child.description:
Text that explains the AgreementTermOrCondition.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during which the AgreementTermOrCondition applies.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: agreement
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association AgreementGovernedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: agreement

child.name: agreementItem
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association AgreementItemGovernedBy

This association end is optional
child.label: agreementItem

child.name: productOfferingTerm
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association ProductTermAppearsAs

This association end is optional
child.label: productOfferingTerm
